page.title: 03WEST BECKTON WALK (2)
page.content: We looked on the map and before the houses were built it was just wasteland. We also went to the new Beckton District Park. It had a trim trail. We had a go on all the apparatus but the park was not yet open. We were some of the first people to go in th park. There was a boating lake and lots ofthings to do. On the lake there were lots of ducks. It was very good. South of the school is King George V park. It has a skateboard rink. The field that belongs to our school is next to the park. There is a club in the park. You can play table tennis, snooker, cards, make puzzles and other things. There are also swings slides and climbing frames. In the east of the park there are small hills. Lots of people take their dogs for a walk.
